title: "Selfie scraping Clearview AI hit with another €20M ban order in Europe"
excerpt: "Clearview AI has been hit with another sanction for breaching European privacy rules. The Athens-based Hellenic data protection authority has fined the controversial facial recognition firm €20 million and banned it from collecting and processing the personal data of people living in Greece."
